revised_title: Laboratory Support for Rural Health Care: Challenges and Opportunities
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities of providing laboratory support for rural health care. It highlights the importance of simple screening tests, the need for specialized training for rural health care staff, and the role of health auxiliaries in collecting and processing specimens. The article also addresses the limitations of available technology and infrastructure in rural settings and suggests ways to improve the overall health care system.
